midi-qol.ItemDeleteCheck.Name: Item Delete Check
midi-qol.ItemDeleteCheck.Hint: Open a confirmation dialog when trying to delete items from character sheet
midi-qol.DamageImmunities.Name: Apply Damage immunities
midi-qol.DamageImmunities.Hint: When using midi-qol damage buttons or auto applying damage apply target's damage immunity/vulnerabilities/resistances. All damage types are checked.
midi-qol.WorldKeyMappings.Name: World vs Client Key Configuration
midi-qol.WorldKeyMappings.Blurb1: Key mappings are defined per client. Each player can have different key mappings. To force all clients to have the same key mappings use one of the available modules to enforce common settings.
midi-qol.WorldKeyMappings.Blurb2: I have tested 'Force Client Controls' with success
midi-qol.SpeedAbilityRolls.Name: Enable Speed Ability (save/check/skill) Rolls
midi-qol.ShowItemDetails.Name: Show Item details in chat card
midi-qol.ShowItemDetails.Hint: If set the item details will be displayed in the chat card. You can use the DND5E system setting to auto hide the description
midi-qol.AutoRollAttack.Name: When item is rolled, automatically roll the attack if there is one
midi-qol.AutoRollAttack.Hint: When the attack is rolled the auto fast forward roll settings are used to decide what to do
midi-qol.AutoFastForward.Name: Auto fast forward rolls
midi-qol.AutoFastForward.Hint: When rolling attack or damage always fast forward rolls also applies when clicking on attack/damage buttons
midi-qol.AutoCheckHit.Name: Auto check if attack hits target
midi-qol.AutoCheckHit.Hint: Check if an attack roll hits selected targets - damage is rolled if one or more targets is hit and auto roll damage is enabled. If disabled midi-qol will assume the attack hits and continue rolling.
midi-qol.RequiresTargets.Name: Require targets to be selected
midi-qol.RequiresTargets.Hint: Require tokens to be targeted before rolls. Never means never require targets to be set, In Combat means only in combat and always whenever an item with targets is rolled.
midi-qol.AutoApplyDamage.Name: Auto apply damage to target
midi-qol.AutoApplyDamage.Hint: Auto apply damage to hit targets (if auto check hits on) or targets user has selected
midi-qol.PlayerDamageCard.Name: Show a player's damage card
midi-qol.PlayerDamageCard.Hint: A simpler version of the damage card. Only displayed if the GM card is displayed. Card is not shown to the GM
midi-qol.PlayerCardDamageDifferent.Name: Display the player damage card if the rolled damage does not match the applied damage for some target
midi-qol.ItemRollButtons.Name: Add attack/damage buttons to item inventory list
midi-qol.ItemRollButtons.Hint: Add Roll Buttons to item description - these buttons support ctrl/alt/shift to skip the dialog
midi-qol.AddChatDamageButtons.Name: Add damage buttons to chat message
midi-qol.AddChatDamageButtons.Hint: Enable the dnd5e damage tray on chat messages.
midi-qol.AutoRollDamage.Name: Auto roll Damage
midi-qol.AutoRollDamage.Hint: Automatically roll Damage when an attack roll is made. If auto roll damage is set to attack-hits midi will roll damage if no targets are selected, the attack hits (see auto check hits) or hits are not being checked
midi-qol.AutoCheckSaves.Name: Auto check Saves
midi-qol.AutoCheckSaves.Hint: Automatically check saving throws when a saving throw is required. If disabled midi will assume that all targets failed their save.
midi-qol.DisplaySaveDC.Name: Display Saving throw DC
midi-qol.DisplaySaveDC.Hint: If false hide the DC of the saving throw from the players (Merge card only)
midi-qol.AutoRemoveTargets.Name: Un-target at end of turn
midi-qol.AutoRemoveTargets.Hint: At the end of you turn choose which targets to automatically un-target
midi-qol.noItemNamed: Your selected token does not have an item named
midi-qol.noTokens: Cannot apply effect - no token targeted
midi-qol.HideNPCNames.Name: Hide token names
midi-qol.HideNPCNames.Hint: Hide token names in hit/save chat messages
midi-qol.AutoTarget.Name: Auto target on template draw
midi-qol.AutoTarget.Hint: When placing a template (e.g. spell) auto target tokens inside the template. If 'Center + Levels' is set in ranged targeting Levels Volumetric Templates will be used (if installed)
midi-qol._comment for translators_noDama: In foundry v9 the array json element is no longer supported, so only the v9 version will be used
midi-qol.noDamageonSaveSpellsv9: Acid Splash, Sword Burst, Thunderclap, Vicious Mockery, Create Bonfire, Lightning Lure, Poison Spray, Cordon of Arrow, Disintegrate, Sacred Flame, Cordon of Arrows, Frostbite,  Infestation, Toll the Dead, Word of Radiance, Catapult,  Earth Tremor
midi-qol.noGM: No GM user connected cannot apply effects/update Hit Points
midi-qol.showGM.Name: GM Sees all whispered messages
midi-qol.showGM.Hint: GM sees all whispered messages sent even if the game settings say the GM won't see them
midi-qol.ColoredBorders.Name: Colored Border Messages
midi-qol.ColoredBorders.Hint: Each chat message has a border in the player characters color
midi-qol.AutoEffects.Name: Auto apply item effects
midi-qol.AutoEffects.Hint: Automatically apply item active effects to targets if they are hit, failed a save or don't get a save. Works better with about-time and/or times-up as well.

midi-qol.AutoEffectsOptions.applyNoButton: Apply effects do not show button

midi-qol.RangeTarget.Name: Auto target for ranged target spells/attacks
midi-qol.RangeTarget.Hint: Auto target for ranged target types if the target type is creature/enemy/ally
midi-qol.PlayerRollSaves.Name: Prompt Players to Roll Saves
midi-qol.PlayerRollSaves.Hint: Players Roll saves. None means midi will roll the save. Otherwise, the player will get a whispered chat message or Monk's Token bar prompt.
midi-qol.rollNPCSaves.Name: Prompt GM to Roll Saves (Unlinked)
midi-qol.rollNPCLinkedSaves.Name: Prompt GM to Roll Saves (Linked)
midi-qol.rollNPCSaves.Hint: Auto means the midi will roll the save for the Actor. Otherwise, the GM will be prompted according to the setting.
midi-qol.PlayerSaveTimeout.Name: Timeout before rolling for players
midi-qol.PlayerSaveTimeout.Hint: How long to wait before taking over the player's save for them in seconds
midi-qol.PreRollChecks.Name: Experimental: Apply checks before doing speed/macro roll
midi-qol.PreRollChecks.Hint: Experimental: Checks before doing an item roll; currently in range and roller has > 0 HP
midi-qol.noTargets: You must target a token before rolling the attack
midi-qol.wrongNumberTargets: You must target at most {allowedTargets} token(s) before rolling the attack
midi-qol.UseTokenNames.Name: Chat cards use token name
midi-qol.UseTokenNames.Hint: Chat card titles and target names use the token name rather than the actor name
midi-qol.CriticalDamage.Name: Choose critical damage for Players
midi-qol.CriticalDamage.Hint: DND5e Settings Only - standard dnd5e critical roll, Max Normal Damage - base weapon dice only (no critical dice) but all maximised, Max Critical Dice - critical dice maximised, Max All Dice - item + critical dice maximised, double dice value - result of dice x2, Explode Critical Dice - roll normal critical exploding any critical dice, Only Item Extra Critical - the only bonus damage for critical is from the item extra critical field, Max Base Roll Crit - use maximum base damage then roll critical dice as usual
midi-qol.CriticalDamageGM.Name: Choose critical damage for GM

midi-qol.CriticalDamageChoices.maxDamageExplode: Max base damage and explode critical dice
midi-qol.CriticalDamageChoices.bestOfTwo: Roll damage die twice and pick the highest

midi-qol.MergeCard.Name: Merge Rolls to one card
midi-qol.MergeCard.Hint: Merge Attack, Hits, Damage, Saves to a single chat card
midi-qol.MergeCardCondensed.Name: Condense Attack/Damage Rolls
midi-qol.MergeCardCondensed.Hint: Conserve a little chat log space by making attack and damage rolls smaller
midi-qol.CheckSaveText.Name: Search item description
midi-qol.CheckSaveText.Hint: Search item description for save type - 'half as much damage' and if present spell does 1/2 damage on save. If unchecked assume a save does default save modifier damage
midi-qol.noAttackRoll: You must roll the attack before rolling the damage
midi-qol.Hint: Configure the various workflow settings for midi-qol. Be warned there are lots of them

midi-qol.DiceSounds.Hint: Sound to play for different sorts of rolls. ONLY applies to the combo card

midi-qol.UseCustomSounds.Name: Enable midi-qol custom sounds
midi-qol.UseCustomSounds.Hint: If set will override system sounds. Configure sounds from the 'Configure Midi Custom Sounds' Application
midi-qol:Debug.Name: Enable Debug
midi-qol:Debug.Hint: 'Warnings' gives an overview of activity, 'debug' adds more info and 'all' turns on CONFIG.debug.hooks as well

midi-qol.hideRollDetailsOptions.attackTotalOnly: Show the attack roll total only

midi-qol.ForceHideRoll.Hint: Display nothing to non-recipients for private/blind/self-rolls. Thanks to felix.mueller.86@web.de

midi-qol.EnableWorkflow.Hint: If enabled automation of rolls can be configured in the Workflow Settings panel

midi-qol.DragDropTarget.Hint: Allow dragging an item onto a token to attack it
midi-qol.AutoAttack.Name: Auto roll attack
midi-qol.AutoDamage.Name: Auto roll damage

midi-qol.AutoFastForwardDamage.Name: Auto fast forward damage
midi-qol.ItemList: Choose items which display details on item card
midi-qol.RollOtherDamage.Name: Roll Other damage formula for rwak/mwak
midi-qol.RollOtherSpellDamage.Name: Roll Other damage formula for spells
midi-qol.RollOtherDamage.Hint:
Off Don't roll Other damage automatically.
Condition True & Save Present If the condition is not blank and evaluates to true OR the item has a save and the activation condition is not false.
Condition roll the Other damage if the other damage condition is empty or evaluates to true
midi-qol.RemoveButtons.Name: Remove chat card buttons after roll
midi-qol.ActiveConcentrationSpell.Title: Active Concentration Spell
midi-qol.ActiveConcentrationSpell.Conten: You are already concentrating on @NAME@. End concentration and continue?
You are already concentrating. End concentration and continue?
midi-qol.ConcentrationAutomation.Name: Enable Midi-qol Concentration Automation
midi-qol.ConcentrationAutomation.Hint:
If enabled midi will handle concentration management and you must disable DnD5e concentration.
If DnD5e concentration is not disabled this setting will be force set to unchecked.
Using DnD5e concentration is recommended and the rest of the settings will work with Dnd5e concentration
midi-qol.SingleConcentrationRoll.Name: Single Concentration Check
midi-qol.SingleConcentrationRoll.Hint: If enabled and the attack is rolling normal damage + a save + other/versatile damage only roll a single concentration check for the combined damage
If enabled loss of temporary HP will trigger a concentration check.
Disabling this is homebrew. Rules as written DND5E is that temp hp damage triggers a concentration check
midi-qol.RemoveConcentrationEffects.Name: Remove concentration when effects removed
midi-qol.RemoveConcentrationEffects.Hint: Check when effects (effects & templates) are removed. If all effects and templates for the concentration spell/feature have been removed remove concentration
midi-qol.SavesBase: If target saves, the item does:
midi-qol.SavesBonus: If target saves, Bonus Damage macros do:
midi-qol.SavesOther: If target saves, Other Formula does:
midi-qol.DamageMacro.Name: Bonus Damage Macros
midi-qol.DamageMacro.Hint: Comma separated list of macros to call when calculating damage which will be applied when calculating damage to targets
midi-qol.AttackMacro.Name: Attack Bonus Macros
midi-qol.AttackMacro.Hint: Comma separated list of macros to call when calculating attack roll which will be applied when checking if the attack hit the targets
midi-qol.OptionalRules.Name: Optional Game Rules
midi-qol.OptionalRules.Hint: DND5E Game rules that you may wish to enable. Generally, don't work with better rolls.
midi-qol.InvisAdvantage.Name: Unseen/Invisible attackers have advantage/disadvantage on attacks
midi-qol.InvisAdvantage.Hint: Rules as written Invisible attackers have advantage on attacks. Disadvantage if the target is invisible
midi-qol.InvisVision.Name: Force vision when checking
midi-qol.InvisVision.Hint:
Checked behaves as if all tokens have vision enabled.
Unchecked tokens without vision can see everything
midi-qol.HiddenAdvantage.Name: Hidden attackers have adv/disadv on attacks
midi-qol.HiddenAdvantage.Hint: Hidden attackers have advantage on attacks. Disadvantage if the target is hidden
midi-qol.CantSeeAdvantage.Hint: Use Token Vision Invisible attackers have advantage on targets who can't see them. Disadvantage if they can't see the target
midi-qol.CheckRange.Name: Check weapon range when attacking
midi-qol.NearbyFoe.Name: Ranged attacks when a foe is closer than this have disadvantage. 0 disables
midi-qol.WallsBlockRange.Name: Walls block ranged attacks
midi-qol.WallsBlockRange.Hint1: No = wall do not block range checks
midi-qol.WallsBlockRange.Hint2: center = check center to center line
midi-qol.WallsBlockRange.Hint3: center + Levels = center check but use the 'levels' module to determine wall blocking LOS. Also use levels volumetric templates for template targeting
midi-qol.WallsBlockRange.Hint4: levels Auto Cover = Use levelsautocover to test and block for full cover
midi-qol.WallsBlockRange.Hint5: Alternative Token Visibility = Use Alternative Token Visibility to test and block for full cover
midi-qol.NearbyAllyRanged.Name: (House Rule) Ranged Attacks at foes near allies have disadvantage
midi-qol.CoverCalculation.Name: Calculate Cover
midi-qol.CoverCalculation.Hint: Calculate AC bonus for targets in cover - settings taken from the selected module
midi-qol.NearbyAllyRanged.Hint: Ranged Attacks with allies nearby (5 feet) to the target have disadvantage for targets smaller than this (w*h). 0 disables
midi-qol.Incapacitated.Name: When an Incapacitated actor takes an action, MidiQOL should
midi-qol.RemoveHiddenInvis.Name: Attacking removes hidden (use CE/CV/CUB/core foundry specialStatus )
midi-qol.CriticalSaves.Name: (House Rule) Critical/Fumble always succeed/fail for saving throws
midi-qol.MaxDRValue.Name: (House rule) Enabling this means that only the most effective Damage Reduction will apply. Off means DR accumulates
midi-qol.DRAllPerDamageDetail.Name: (House Rule) DRALL (DR.rwak/...) is deducted from BOTH attack damage and Other damage
midi-qol.DRAllPerDamageDetail.Hint: Unchecked means DRALL applies just once to the total damage
midi-qol.KeepRollStats.Name: Keep Roll Statistics
midi-qol.KeepRollStats.Hint: Record attack and damage roll data for actors
midi-qol.SaveStatsEvery.Name: Save statistics Every
midi-qol.SaveStatsEvery.Hint: Save statistics every N rolls. Each attack and damage counts as a roll. Suggest 10-20 or greater
midi-qol.PlayerStatsOnly.Name: Player statistics only
midi-qol.PlayerStatsOnly.Hint: Only keep statistics for player owned actors
midi-qol.DefaultSaveMult.Name: Default saving throw multiplier
midi-qol.DefaultSaveMult.Hint: If there are no other modifiers a saving throw will do this fraction of the damage of the original attack. Default 0.5, half damage on save. You should only change this if you know how multipliers work
midi-qol.RequireMagical.Name: Require 'Magical' property
midi-qol.RequireMagical.Hint:
Magical Property is either the dnd5e property Magical or the midi-qol Magic Damage property. If set the item does magical damage.
Off non-weapons do magical damage by default, weapons do magical damage if attack bonus > 0.
Non Spell means only spells do magical damage by default.
All no item does magical damage by default
midi-qol.DoConcentrationCheck.Name: Force a concentration save when damage taken
midi-qol.DoConcentrationCheck.Hint:
Chat Message Only display a chat message with a button (dnd5e default behaviour and required dnd5e concentration)
Chat message + Auto Roll display a chat message and auto roll the save (requires dnd5e concentration)
Roll Concentration Item roll a concentration item check (midi standard behaviour)
midi-qol.RemoveConcentration.Name: Remove concentration on failed concentration save
midi-qol.UsePlayerPortrait.Name: Use Actor portrait in chat cards
midi-qol.UsePlayerPortrait.Hint: For Actors of type character use the actor portrait instead of the token image in midi-qol chat cards
midi-qol.DistanceIncludesHeight.Name: Include height difference in distance calculations
midi-qol.NoSocketLib: Midi-qol requires socketlib installed and enabled

midi-qol.ImportConfig: Import midi-qol settings from json file

midi-qol.ExportCSV: Export Roll Stats to CSV file

midi-qol.SoundSettingsBlurb.2: Choose 'Create Sample playlist, which will create a playlist 'Midi Item Sounds' with a few sounds
midi-qol.SoundSettingsBlurb.4: The other create setting add more details/complexity

midi-qol.CheckFlanking.Name: Check Flanking
midi-qol.CheckFlanking.Hint: Check if you and your allies flank the opponent. Gives attacker advantage, applies Flanking condition to attacker, or applies Flanked condition to target. Requires restart if changing to use one of the Midi options.

midi-qol.CheckFlankingOptions.ceflankedNoconga: Convenient Effects Flanked + no conga line

midi-qol.RollAlternate.Name: Move roll formula to tooltip
midi-qol.RollAlternate.Hint: Use alternate roll display on merge card moving the roll formula to the tooltip and optionally add advantage attribution
midi-qol.OptionalCritRule.Name: (House Rule) Critical Roll Margin
midi-qol.OptionalCritRule.Hint: Attack Rolls this much above AC are critical. -1 disables
midi-qol.CriticalNat20.Name: (House Rule) Allow normal critical rolls
midi-qol.CriticalNat20.Hint: A roll above critical threshold is still a critical even if it does not meet the margin requirements
Don't wait for damage roll before expiring attack/hit/action special duration effects
Allow any reaction spell to be used
Do not require available spell slots or preparation when choosing reaction spells
midi-qol.DamageResistanceMultiplier.Name: Resistance reduces damage to
midi-qol.DamageImmunityMultiplier.Name: Immunity reduces damage to
midi-qol.ShowFastForward.Name: Show Fast Forward
midi-qol.ShowFastForward.Hint: Show Fast Forward indicator on attack and damage buttons
midi-qol.AutoRemoveTemplate.Name: Auto remove placed template on spell expiry
midi-qol.AutoRemoveSummonedCreature.Name: Auto remove summoned creatures on item expiry/concentration removal (for dnd5e summons items)
midi-qol.AttackPerTarget.Name: Roll a separate attack per target
midi-qol.SkillAbilityCheckAdvantage.Name: Ability Check Advantage gives Skill Advantage
midi-qol.SkillAbilityCheckAdvantage.Hint: If an actor has advantage/disadvantage on ability checks, skills based on that ability also have advantage/disadvantage
midi-qol.HighlightSuccess.Name: Color code Hit/Miss/Save Display
midi-qol.HighlightSuccess.Hint: When displaying hits/misses, hits/saves are in green and misses/failed saves in red
midi-qol.HighLightCriticalAttackOnly.Hin: Override dnd5e highlighting attacks hits and misses and only highlight critical/fumble attack rolls
midi-qol.OptionalRuleVitality.Name: (House Rule) Vitality pool
midi-qol.OptionalRuleVitality.Hint: when set to a resource damage applied to a target with 0 HP does damage to the vitality resource. If that reaches 0 the target is dead
midi-qol.AutoRerollInitiative.Name: Auto reroll initiative
midi-qol.AutoRerollInitiative.Hint: Auto reroll initiative for all combatants at the start of a new round. Warning: can break round/turn effect expiry
midi-qol.RollChecksBlind.Name: Which ability checks are rolled blind
midi-qol.RollSavesBlind.Name: Which ability saves are rolled blind
midi-qol.RollSkillsBlind.Name: Which skill checks are rolled blind

midi-qol.UndoWorkflow.Name: Support undoing item rolls
midi-qol.UndoWorkflow.Hint: If enabled midi will store undo data for all item/activity rolls. Undo via MidiQOL.undoMostRecentWorkflow()
midi-qol.UndoWorkflow.title: Undo workflow
midi-qol.UndoWorkflow.removeFirstWorkflow: Remove Top/Most Recent Workflow From List (WARNING)
midi-qol.UndoWorkflow.undoFirstWorkflow: Undo Top/Most Recent Workflow From List
midi-qol.UndoWorkflow.GMOnly: Only the GM can undo workflows

midi-qol.cubNotSupported: Combat Utility Belt will not be migrated to version 11. Midi will remove support for CUB in midi version 11.1.0

midi-qol.TroubleShooter.Name: Open Trouble Shooter
midi-qol.TroubleShooter.Hint: Trouble shooter to help diagnose problems and collect settings
midi-qol.TroubleShooter.Label: Troubleshooter

midi-qol.EnforceSingleWeaponTarget.Name: Weapons attack single target
midi-qol.EnforceSingleWeaponTarget.Hint: Weapons with no target specification can only attack one target
midi-qol.DisplayBonusRolls.Name: Show before and after optional bonus chat card
midi-qol.DisplayBonusRolls.Hint: Display a chat card with the before and after roll when an optional bonus is applied
midi-qol.MergeCardMulti.Name: Add extra buttons to merge card
midi-qol.MergeCardMulti.Hint: Add buttons for advantage/disadvantage critical/nocritical to the item chart card
midi-qol.ConfirmAttackDamage.Name: Display Confirm Roll Button
midi-qol.ConfirmAttackDamage.Hint: Pause after rolling attack/damage for the player/GM to confirm
midi-qol.AverageDamage.Name: All damage/critical rolls are 'average' results
midi-qol.GriddedGridless.Name: Gridless Grid
midi-qol.GridlessFudge.Name: Fudge factor
midi-qol.GridlessFudge.Hint: Subtract the fudge factor from the measured distance when checking range. Specified in grid scale units, i.e. ft/m
midi-qol.GriddedGridless.Hint: If set midi will use the square grid for all distance calculations in gridless scenes
midi-qol.TargetConfirmation.hasAttack: Confirm targets if rolled item has an attack
midi-qol.TargetConfirmationCreatureTarge: Confirm targets if rolled item has 'creature' target
midi-qol.TargetConfirmationSelfTarget: Confirm targets if self is targeted
midi-qol.TargetConfirmationAoETarget: Confirm targets if item has an AoE
midi-qol.TargetConfirmationRangedAoE: Confirm targets if item has ranged AoE
midi-qol.TargetConfirmationLongRangeTarg: Confirm targets if any target is long range
midi-qol.TargetConfirmationCoveredTarget: Confirm targets if any target has cover
midi-qol.TargetConfirmationMixedDisposit: Confirm targets if targeting allies and hostiles
midi-qol.TargetConfirmationAllies: Confirm targets if any target is an ally
midi-qol.SaveDROrder.Name: Damage Reduction Save Order
midi-qol.SaveDROrder.Hint: Order in which damage reduction is applied. If 'none' damage reduction is applied
midi-qol.WaitingForPreviousWorkflow: Previous roll of {name} has not completed.
midi-qol.ResolvePreviousWorkflow: Choose what to do with the previous roll
midi-qol.ConcentrationIncapacitatedCondi: Remove concentration when incapacitated status applied
Incapacitated, Dead,  Unconscious, Petrified, Paralysed and Stunned remove concentration
midi-qol.AutoCompleteWorkflow.Name: Autocomplete workflow if required
midi-qol.AutoCompleteWorkflow.Hint: Workflows will be marked as complete if rolled before completion, no extra rolls will be performed
midi-qol.AddFakeDice.Name: Add fake dice to GM Dice So Nice rolls
midi-qol.MidiFieldsTab.Name: Display Midi item fields in a separate tab
midi-qol.UndoChatColor.Name: Undo Chat Cards Color
midi-qol.UndoChatColor.Hint: Delete means remove the chat card on undo. Otherwise, the undone chats are recoloured
midi-qol.MidiPropertiesTab.Name: Lowest User role for Item's properties
midi-qol.MidiPropertiesTab.Hint: Lowest user role than can access an Item's midi-qol properties tab. Requires reload on change
midi-qol.CollapsibleTargets.Name: Collapsible Targets
midi-qol.CollapsibleTargets.Hint: The Hit/Miss target display in the chat card are collapsible
midi-qol.AutoRemoveInstantaneousTemplate: Templates placed by an item with duration instantaneous are removed at the end of the item roll
midi-qol.ReplaceDefaultActivities.Name: Replace dnd5e activities with midi-qol equivalents
midi-qol.ReplaceDefaultActivities.Hint: Any existing activities, Attack, Damage, Save, Check, Utility will instead use the midi versions. This is required to automate SRD items, otherwise you will need to hand configure every item for midi automation.
midi-qol.AutoMergeActivityOther.Name: Auto merge other activity for Midi Attack Activities (Requires Reload)
midi-qol.AutoMergeActivityOther.Hint: If an item only has an attack activity and single Damage, Save, Check or Utility it will be merged with the Attack activity
midi-qol.ConfirmAmmunition.Name: Confirm Ammunition choice when rolling attack - shows attack roll configuration
midi-qol.ActivityNamePrefix.Name: Activity Prefix
midi-qol.ActivityNamePrefix.Hint: Prefix midi-qol activities name with Midi. Change requires reload
midi-qol.dnd5eConcentrationTrackingDisab:
DND5E Concentration Tracking Disabled

Concentration Tracking is disabled in the dnd5e system settings.
Enable in DND5E settings to enable midi concentration settings

ItemDeleteCheck.Name: Vrification de la suppression d'objet
ItemDeleteCheck.Hint: Ouvre une bote de dialogue de confirmation lors de la tentative de suppression d'objets de la feuille de personnage.

DamageImmunities.Name: Appliquer les immunits aux dgts
DamageImmunities.Hint: Lors de l'utilisation des boutons de dgts de midi-qol ou de l'application automatique des dgts, applique l'immunit/vulnrabilit/rsistance aux dgts de la cible. Tous les types de dgts sont vrifis.

WorldKeyMappings.Name: Configuration des touches Monde vs Client
WorldKeyMappings.Blurb1: Les assignations de touches sont dfinies par client. Chaque joueur peut avoir des assignations de touches diffrentes. Pour forcer tous les clients  avoir les mmes assignations de touches, utilisez l'un des modules disponibles pour imposer des paramtres communs.
WorldKeyMappings.Blurb2: J'ai test 'Force Client Controls' avec succs.

SpeedAbilityRolls.Name: Activer les jets rapides de caractristiques (sauvegarde/test/comptence)

ShowItemDetails.Name: Afficher les dtails de l'objet dans la carte de tchat
ShowItemDetails.Hint: Si activ, les dtails de l'objet seront affichs dans la carte de tchat. Vous pouvez utiliser le paramtre systme D&D5E pour masquer automatiquement la description.

AutoRollAttack.Name: Lorsque l'objet est lanc, lancer automatiquement l'attaque s'il y en a une
AutoRollAttack.Hint: Lorsque l'attaque est lance, les paramtres de jet en avance rapide automatique sont utiliss pour dcider quoi faire.

AutoFastForward.Name: Jets en avance rapide automatique
AutoFastForward.Hint: Lors du lancer d'attaque ou de dgts, toujours utiliser l'avance rapide pour les jets ; s'applique galement en cliquant sur les boutons d'attaque/dgts.

AutoCheckHit.Name: Vrifier automatiquement si l'attaque touche la cible
AutoCheckHit.Hint: Vrifie si un jet d'attaque touche les cibles slectionnes - les dgts sont lancs si une ou plusieurs cibles sont touches et que le lancer automatique des dgts est activ. Si dsactiv, midi-qol supposera que l'attaque touche et continuera le lancer.

RequiresTargets.Name: Exiger la slection de cibles
RequiresTargets.Hint: Exige que des tokens soient cibls avant les jets. Jamais signifie ne jamais exiger que des cibles soient dfinies, En combat signifie uniquement en combat et Toujours signifie chaque fois qu'un objet avec des cibles est lanc.

AutoApplyDamage.Name: Appliquer automatiquement les dgts  la cible
AutoApplyDamage.Hint: Applique automatiquement les dgts aux cibles touches (si la vrification automatique des touches est active) ou aux cibles slectionnes par l'utilisateur.

PlayerDamageCard.Name: Afficher une carte de dgts pour le joueur
PlayerDamageCard.Hint: Une version plus simple de la carte de dgts. Affiche uniquement si la carte du MJ est affiche. La carte n'est pas montre au MJ.

PlayerCardDamageDifferent.Name: Afficher la carte de dgts du joueur si les dgts lancs ne correspondent pas aux dgts appliqus pour une cible

ItemRollButtons.Name: Ajouter des boutons d'attaque/dgts  la liste d'inventaire des objets
ItemRollButtons.Hint: Ajoute des boutons de lancer  la description de l'objet - ces boutons supportent Ctrl/Alt/Shift pour sauter la bote de dialogue.

AddChatDamageButtons.Name: Ajouter des boutons de dgts au message de tchat
AddChatDamageButtons.Hint: Active la barre de dgts D&D5E sur les messages de tchat.

AddChatDamageButtonsOptions.gm: Ajouter des boutons uniquement pour le MJ
AddChatDamageButtonsOptions.pc: Ajouter des boutons uniquement pour les joueurs
AddChatDamageButtonsOptions.both: Ajouter des boutons pour tout le monde

AutoRollDamage.Name: Lancer automatiquement les dgts
AutoRollDamage.Hint: Lance automatiquement les dgts lorsqu'un jet d'attaque est effectu. Si le lancer automatique des dgts est rgl sur 'attaque-touche', midi lancera les dgts si aucune cible n'est slectionne, si l'attaque touche (voir vrification automatique des touches) ou si les touches ne sont pas vrifies.

AutoCheckSaves.Name: Vrifier automatiquement les sauvegardes
AutoCheckSaves.Hint: Vrifie automatiquement les jets de sauvegarde lorsqu'un jet de sauvegarde est requis. Si dsactiv, midi supposera que toutes les cibles ont chou  leur sauvegarde.

DisplaySaveDC.Name: Afficher le DD de sauvegarde
DisplaySaveDC.Hint: Si faux, masque le DD du jet de sauvegarde aux joueurs (carte fusionne uniquement).

AutoRemoveTargets.Name: Dcibler  la fin du tour
AutoRemoveTargets.Hint: la fin de votre tour, choisissez quelles cibles dcibler automatiquement.

midi-qol.noItemNamed: Votre token slectionn n'a pas d'objet nomm
midi-qol.noTokens: Impossible d'appliquer l'effet - aucun token cibl

HideNPCNames.Name: Masquer les noms des tokens
HideNPCNames.Hint: Masque les noms des tokens dans les messages de tchat de touche/sauvegarde.

midi-qol.noTemplateSeen: Le gabarit n'a pas t plac

AutoTarget.Name: Ciblage automatique lors du dessin du gabarit
AutoTarget.Hint: Lors du placement d'un gabarit (par ex. sort), cible automatiquement les tokens  l'intrieur du gabarit. Si 'Centre + Niveaux' est dfini dans le ciblage  distance, les Gabarits Volumtriques Levels seront utiliss (si installs).

midi-qol._comment for translators_noDamageOnSaveS: Dans Foundry v9, l'lment json tableau n'est plus support, seule la version v9 sera utilise.
midi-qol.noDamageonSaveSpellsv9: Aspersion d'acide, Explosion de lames, Coup de tonnerre, Moquerie cruelle, Cration de feu de joie, Leurre foudroyant, Aspersion de poison, Cordon de flches, Dsintgration, Flamme sacre, Cordon de flches, Morsure de givre, Infestation, Glas des morts, Mot de radiance, Catapulte, Secousse
midi-qol.noGM: Aucun utilisateur MJ connect, impossible d'appliquer les effets/mettre  jour les points de vie.

showGM.Name: Le MJ voit tous les messages privs
showGM.Hint: Le MJ voit tous les messages privs envoys mme si les paramtres du jeu indiquent que le MJ ne les verra pas.

ColoredBorders.Name: Messages avec bordures colores
ColoredBorders.Hint: Chaque message de tchat a une bordure de la couleur du personnage joueur.

AutoEffects.Name: Appliquer automatiquement les effets d'objet
AutoEffects.Hint: Applique automatiquement les effets actifs des objets aux cibles si elles sont touches, ont chou  une sauvegarde ou n'obtiennent pas de sauvegarde. Fonctionne mieux avec about-time et/ou times-up galement.

AutoEffectsOptions.off: Ne pas appliquer automatiquement les effets
AutoEffectsOptions.applyNoButton: Appliquer les effets, ne pas montrer le bouton
AutoEffectsOptions.applyRemove: Appliquer les effets et retirer le bouton
AutoEffectsOptions.applyLeave: Appliquer les effets mais laisser le bouton

RangeTarget.Name: Ciblage automatique pour les sorts/attaques  cible distante
RangeTarget.Hint: Ciblage automatique pour les types de cibles distantes si le type de cible est crature/ennemi/alli.

PlayerRollSaves.Name: Inviter les joueurs  lancer les sauvegardes
PlayerRollSaves.Hint: Les joueurs lancent les sauvegardes. Aucun signifie que midi lancera la sauvegarde. Sinon, le joueur recevra un message priv dans le tchat ou une invite de Monk's Token Bar.

rollNPCSaves.Name: Inviter le MJ  lancer les sauvegardes (Non lis)
rollNPCSaves.Hint: Auto signifie que midi lancera la sauvegarde pour l'Acteur. Sinon, le MJ sera invit selon le paramtre.

rollNPCLinkedSaves.Name: Inviter le MJ  lancer les sauvegardes (Lis)

PlayerSaveTimeout.Name: Dlai d'attente avant de lancer pour les joueurs
PlayerSaveTimeout.Hint: Combien de temps attendre avant de prendre en charge la sauvegarde du joueur  sa place (en secondes).

PreRollChecks.Name: Exprimental : Appliquer les vrifications avant de faire un jet rapide/macro
PreRollChecks.Hint: Exprimental : Vrifications avant de faire un jet d'objet ; actuellement  porte et le lanceur a > 0 PV.

midi-qol.noTargets: Vous devez cibler un token avant de lancer l'attaque.
midi-qol.wrongNumberTargets: Vous devez cibler au maximum {allowedTargets} token(s) avant de lancer l'attaque.

UseTokenNames.Name: Les cartes de tchat utilisent le nom du token
UseTokenNames.Hint: Les titres des cartes de tchat et les noms des cibles utilisent le nom du token plutt que le nom de l'acteur.

CriticalDamage.Name: Choisir les dgts critiques pour les joueurs
CriticalDamage.Hint: Paramtres D&D5E uniquement - jet critique standard dnd5e, Dgts normaux max - ds de l'arme de base uniquement (pas de ds critiques) mais tous maximiss, Ds critiques max - ds critiques maximiss, Tous les ds max - ds de l'objet + ds critiques maximiss, valeur des ds double - rsultat des ds x2, Explosion des ds critiques - lancer les critiques normaux en faisant exploser tout d critique, Uniquement les critiques extra de l'objet - le seul bonus de dgts pour critique vient du champ critique extra de l'objet, Critique max du jet de base - utiliser les dgts de base maximum puis lancer les ds critiques comme d'habitude.

CriticalDamageGM.Name: Choisir les dgts critiques pour le MJ

CriticalDamageChoices.maxDamageExplode: Dgts de base max et exploser les ds critiques
CriticalDamageChoices.explodeCharacter: Exploser les ds critiques du personnage
CriticalDamageChoices.explodeNPC: Exploser les ds critiques du PNJ
CriticalDamageChoices.baseDamage: Uniquement le critique extra de l'arme
CriticalDamageChoices.maxBaseRollCrit: Critique max du jet de base
CriticalDamageChoices.bestOfTwo: Lancer le d de dgts deux fois et choisir le plus lev

MergeCard.Name: Fusionner les jets en une seule carte
MergeCard.Hint: Fusionne Attaque, Touches, Dgts, Sauvegardes en une seule carte de tchat.

MergeCardCondensed.Name: Condenser les jets d'attaque/dgts
MergeCardCondensed.Hint: conomise un peu d'espace dans le journal de tchat en rendant les jets d'attaque et de dgts plus petits.

CheckSaveText.Name: Rechercher dans la description de l'objet
CheckSaveText.Hint: Recherche dans la description de l'objet le type de sauvegarde - 'la moiti des dgts' et si prsent, le sort inflige 1/2 dgts en cas de sauvegarde russie. Si dcoch, suppose qu'une sauvegarde russie inflige des dgts modifis par le modificateur de sauvegarde par dfaut.

midi-qol.noAttackRoll: Vous devez lancer l'attaque avant de lancer les dgts.
midi-qol.Hint: Configurez les diffrents paramtres de flux de travail pour midi-qol. Attention, il y en a beaucoup.

DiceSounds.Hint: Son  jouer pour diffrents types de jets. S'APPLIQUE UNIQUEMENT  la carte combo.

AutoFastForwardAbilityRolls.Name: Avance rapide pour les jets de caractristique
AutoFastForwardAbilityRolls.Hint: Cliquer sur une caractristique pour dmarrer un test/sauvegarde ou un test de comptence utilisera automatiquement l'avance rapide.

UseCustomSounds.Name: Activer les sons personnaliss de midi-qol
UseCustomSounds.Hint: Si activ, remplacera les sons du systme. Configurez les sons depuis l'application 'Configurer les sons personnaliss Midi'.

autoCheckSavesOptions.allNoRoll: Sauvegarde - Tous voient le rsultat seulement
autoCheckSavesOptions.all: Sauvegarde - Tous voient le rsultat + total de la sauvegarde
autoCheckSavesOptions.allShow: Sauvegarde - Tous voient le Rsultat + Jets

playerDamageCardOptions.playerbuttons: Afficher les rsultats du joueur + boutons
playerDamageCardOptions.npcplayerresults: Afficher les rsultats du joueur et du PNJ

rollNPCSavesOptions.autoDialog: Jet auto et afficher la bote de dialogue de jet

playerRollSavesOptions.noneDialog: Jet auto et afficher la bote de dialogue de jet

AutoRemoveTargetsOptions.dead: Dcibler les morts aprs le jet
AutoRemoveTargetsOptions.allGM: Dcibler les morts et tout le MJ
AutoRemoveTargetsOptions.all: Dcibler tout  la fin du tour

hideRollDetailsOptions.detailsDSN: Formule de jet mais montrer le jet DSN
hideRollDetailsOptions.d20Only: Afficher D20 d'attaque + total des dgts
hideRollDetailsOptions.hitCriticalDamage: Afficher Touche/Rat/Critique/chec critique + total des dgts
hideRollDetailsOptions.attackTotalOnly: Afficher le total du jet d'attaque uniquement

HideRollDetails.Name: Masquage des dtails des jets du MJ
HideRollDetails.Hint: Choisissez quelle partie des jets du MJ masquer/afficher aux joueurs.

HintLong.detailsDSN: Formule de jet mais montrer DSN : Masque les formules de jet mais lance quand mme les ds DSN.
HintLong.details: Formule de jet : masque la formule de jet et n'affiche pas les ds DSN.
HintLong.d20Only: Afficher D20 d'attaque + total des dgts : Affiche le jet de D20 d'attaque et le total des dgts uniquement.
HintLong.hitDamage: Afficher Touche/Rat + total des dgts : Affiche touche/rat plus le total des dgts.
HintLong.d20attackOnly: Afficher D20 d'attaque uniquement : Affiche les ds d'attaque D20 uniquement.
HintLong.all: Jet entier : masque tous les dtails du jet aux joueurs.

ForceHideRoll.Name: Vraiment masquer les jets privs/aveugles/auto-lancs
ForceHideRoll.Hint: N'affiche rien aux non-destinataires pour les jets privs/aveugles/auto-lancs. Merci  felix.mueller.86@web.de

EnableWorkflow.Name: Activer le support de l'automatisation des jets
EnableWorkflow.Hint: Si activ, l'automatisation des jets peut tre configure dans le panneau Paramtres du flux de travail.

playerControlsInvisibleTokens.Name: Les joueurs contrlent les tokens possds cachs

Debug.Name: Activer le dbogage
Debug.Hint: Mettre sur Aucun sauf si vous voulez remplir le journal de la console. Tout active CONFIG.hooks.debug.

AllowUseMacro.Name: Ajouter une macro d'utilisation d'objet  la feuille
AllowUseMacro.Hint: Si activ, ajoute un champ de nom de macro qui sera appel lors de l'utilisation. Voir le fichier Readme pour les dtails.

AllowActorUseMacro.Name: Ajouter une macro d'utilisation d'acteur  la feuille

onUseMacroOptions.preTargeting: Appele avant la rsolution du ciblage (*)
onUseMacroOptions.preItemRoll: Appele avant le lancer de l'objet (*)
onUseMacroOptions.templatePlaced: Appele uniquement une fois qu'un gabarit est plac
onUseMacroOptions.isTargeted: La cible est cible mais avant le lancer de l'objet

Si activ, midi grera la gestion de la concentration et vous devrez dsactiver la concentration DnD5e.
Si la concentration DnD5e n'est pas dsactive, ce paramtre sera forc dsactiv.
L'utilisation de la concentration DnD5e est recommande et les autres paramtres fonctionneront avec la concentration Dnd5e.

RequireMagical.Name: Exiger la proprit 'Magique'
RequireMagical.Hint:
La proprit Magique est soit la proprit dnd5e Magique soit la proprit midi-qol Dgts magiques. Si dfini, l'objet inflige des dgts magiques.
Dsactiv les non-armes infligent des dgts magiques par dfaut, les armes infligent des dgts magiques si le bonus d'attaque > 0.
Non Sort signifie que seuls les sorts infligent des dgts magiques par dfaut.
Tout aucun objet n'inflige de dgts magiques par dfaut.
